ack.p: This work was supported by the Wellcome Trust Vietnam Initiative on Zoonotic Infections Project grant 093724/B/10/Z and a European Union 2020 grant COMPARE #643476 (both to MEJW) and a Natural Environment Research Council PhD studentship (to LB). We further acknowledge past support from the BBSRC, DEFRA, SFC and USAID. We thank all past and present members of the Edinburgh Emerging Viruses Group who have contributed to this database over the past 18 years and whom we submit this publication on behalf of: Kyle Adair, Alex Bhattacharya, Liam Carr, Ben Evans, Elly Gaunt, Sonya Gowtage-Sequeira, Zoe Hudson, Sophia Latham, Lu Lu, Chris McCaffery, David McCulloch, Nick Montgomery, Cristina Moreno, Conor Oâ€™Halloran, Liam Reilly, Julie Robertson, Nora Schmit, Fiona Scott, Donald Smith, Claire Taylor, Louise Taylor, Alex Wallace, Nicola Wardrop, Catriona Waugh and Feifei Zhang. We are grateful to Kevin Olival (EcoHealth Alliance, New York) for sharing data prior to publication.
